oscillation.translation[0].definitions[0: oscillations are frequent changes between two extreme amounts or limits
oscillations in the value of the dollar
oscillation.translation[0].definitions[1: oscillations are frequent changes between one feeling or attitude and another
The drug causes oscillations of mood in some people.
oscillation.translation[0].definitions[2: a regular movement of something from side to side
oscillation.translation[0].definitions[3: a regular change in direction of an electrical current
